interestingcomments.content:
Trading lenses on Leica Classifieds /!/ Recently put my 28 Elmarit up for trade looking for a 35 summarit and someone from the classifieds Facebook group reached out to me. Came up with the idea for us to buy each others lenses via PayPal Goods and services for the same price ($1200 in case something goes wrong) to make the trade more safe and covered by purchase protection.

In my head it seems like a good idea but maybe I'm missing something. If anyone has any thoughts on that idea or a more secure way to trade, I'd love to know! Meeting up in person isn't an option here due to distance.
